Stem: Thick and fleshy with serrated edges.
Flowers: Five lobed, star-shaped, up to 8 cm across. Cream to yellow with brown or purplish markings. Foul smelling.
FruitSeeds: Smooth cylindrical 12 cm long pods that split open to reveal small seeds attached to silky hairs.
Impacts: Forms dense mats preventing native species growth.

Photos.Caption: Seedpods release seeds with silky hairs (the_bush_fundi)
